drive-compromise.name: DNS Query to External Service Interaction Domains
drive-compromise.content: SELECT UTF8(payload) FROM events WHERE UTF8(payload) ILIKE '%.interact.sh%' OR UTF8(payload) ILIKE '%.oast.pro%' OR UTF8(payload) ILIKE '%.oast.live%' OR UTF8(payload) ILIKE '%.oast.site%' OR UTF8(payload) ILIKE '%.oast.online%' OR UTF8(payload) ILIKE '%.oast.fun%' OR UTF8(payload) ILIKE '%.oast.me%' OR UTF8(payload) ILIKE '%.burpcollaborator.net%' OR UTF8(payload) ILIKE '%.oastify.com%' OR UTF8(payload) ILIKE '%.canarytokens.com%' OR UTF8(payload) ILIKE '%.requestbin.net%' OR UTF8(payload) ILIKE '%.dnslog.cn%'
drive-compromise.Author: Nextron Systems

drive-compromise.name: Print History File Contents
drive-compromise.content: SELECT UTF8(payload) FROM events WHERE LOGSOURCENAME(logsourceid) ILIKE '%linux%' AND ("Image" ILIKE '%/cat' OR "Image" ILIKE '%/head' OR "Image" ILIKE '%/tail' OR "Image" ILIKE '%/more') AND (("Process CommandLine" ILIKE '%/.bash_history%' OR "Process CommandLine" ILIKE '%/.zsh_history%') OR ("Process CommandLine" ILIKE '%_history' OR "Process CommandLine" ILIKE '%.history' OR "Process CommandLine" ILIKE '%zhistory'))
drive-compromise.Author: Nextron Systems

profile.name: test-admin
profile.message: Make things as simple as possible but no simpler.
